description: Consider recurrence b(0) = (2n+1)/2, b(n) = b(n-1)*floor(b(n-1)); sequence gives first integer reached.
comments: Number of steps to reach an integer is given by A001511. No integer is reached if initial value is 3/2.
links: J. C. Lagarias and N. J. A. Sloane, Approximate squaring (pdf, ps), Experimental Math., 13 (2004), 113-128.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Sep 27 2003
